doc:
"Erik Rhodes (actor born 1906)" 0 Erik Rhodes (February 10, 1906 – February 17, 1990) was an American film and Broadway singer and actor. He is best remembered today for appearing in two classic Hollywood musical films with popular dancing team of Fred Astaire and Ginger Rogers, The Gay Divorcee (1934) and Top Hat (1935). Erik_Rhodes ( February_10_,_1906 – February_17_,_1990 ) was an_American_film and Broadway_singer_and_actor . He is_best_remembered today for appearing in two_classic_Hollywood_musical_films with popular_dancing_team of Fred_Astaire and Ginger_Rogers , The_Gay_Divorcee ( 1934_)_and_Top_Hat_(_1935_) .
